text: Nihsansaya, akasa ani dharatici nirmiti, ratra ani divasaca pherabadala, lokancya labhadayaka vastu ghe'una naukance samudrata calane, akasatuna pani utaravuna mrta jaminila jivanta karane, tyata pratyeka prakarace jiva pasaravine, varyanci (haveci) disa badalane ani dhaga je akasa va dharaticya daramyana hukumadhina aheta, yata bud'dhimanankarita allahacya samarthyaci nisani ahe
